title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 135.9 - Time of payment of cash compensation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 135.9 - Time of payment of cash compensation

State Regulations

When cash payment for scheduled overtime has been approved by
the Director of the Budget, officers and employees shall be paid for such
overtime compensation in excess of 40 hours per week by the close of the second
bi-weekly payroll period following the period during which the overtime is
earned. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
135.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
